message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this valuable product. I believe it would be a great asset to you. I'm starting the bidding at $1,000,000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but my price reflects the true value of this product.  I could consider a slight reduction to $925,000. This is my final offer.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $850,000?
